text.div:
HSPC Age Units of Measure Value Set

The list of codes used as units of measure for an individual's age.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplay
    moMonth [time]
    wkWeek [time]
    dDay [time]

name: HSPC Age Units of Measure Value Set
description: The list of codes used as units of measure for an individual's age.
copyright: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
